attributes.action: Change rules about bounce back loan. I put my profite in original bounce back.
attributes.additional_details: We should be aloved to change it if we can prove that our sales are more than we stated in original application.
attributes.background: Change rules on bounce back top up. So you can amend sales no one asked for prof of sales from companies who borrowed money. I stated in original form my profit not sales and now l cant change it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
